trans_tendsto_norm_at_top:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =O[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
theorem asymptotics.is_O.trans_tendsto_norm_at_top {α : Type _} {u v : α → 𝕜} {l : filter α} (huv : «expr =O[ ] » u l v)
    (hu : tendsto (fun x => «expr‖ ‖» (u x)) l at_top) : tendsto (fun x => «expr‖ ‖» (v x)) l at_top :=
  by
  rcases huv.exists_pos with ⟨c, hc, hcuv⟩
  rw [is_O_with] at hcuv
  convert tendsto.at_top_div_const hc (tendsto_at_top_mono' l hcuv hu)
  ext x
  rw [mul_div_cancel_left _ hc.ne.symm]
#align asymptotics.is_O.trans_tendsto_norm_at_top asymptotics.is_O.trans_tendsto_norm_at_top
tendsto_zpow_at_top_at_top:
theorem tendsto_zpow_at_top_at_top {n : ℤ} (hn : 0 < n) : tendsto (fun x : 𝕜 => x ^ n) at_top at_top :=
  by
  lift n to ℕ using hn.le
  simp only [zpow_ofNat]
  exact tendsto_pow_at_top (nat.cast_pos.mp hn).ne'
#align tendsto_zpow_at_top_at_top tendsto_zpow_at_top_at_top
tendsto_pow_div_pow_at_top_zero:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem tendsto_pow_div_pow_at_top_zero [topological_space 𝕜] [order_topology 𝕜] {p q : ℕ} (hpq : p < q) :
    tendsto (fun x : 𝕜 => x ^ p / x ^ q) at_top ((nhds) 0) :=
  by
  rw [tendsto_congr' pow_div_pow_eventually_eq_at_top]
  apply tendsto_zpow_at_top_zero
  linarith
#align tendsto_pow_div_pow_at_top_zero tendsto_pow_div_pow_at_top_zero
tendsto_pow_div_pow_at_top_at_top:
theorem tendsto_pow_div_pow_at_top_at_top {p q : ℕ} (hpq : q < p) :
    tendsto (fun x : 𝕜 => x ^ p / x ^ q) at_top at_top :=
  by
  rw [tendsto_congr' pow_div_pow_eventually_eq_at_top]
  apply tendsto_zpow_at_top_at_top
  linarith
#align tendsto_pow_div_pow_at_top_at_top tendsto_pow_div_pow_at_top_at_top

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
theorem asymptotics.is_o.sum_range {α : Type _} [normed_add_comm_group α] {f : ℕ → α} {g : ℕ → exprℝ}
    (h : «expr =o[ ] » f at_top g) (hg : 0 ≤ g)
    (h'g :
      tendsto
        (fun n =>
          finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n)
            (g i))
        at_top at_top) :
    «expr =o[ ] »
      (fun n =>
        finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n) (f i))
      at_top fun n =>
      finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n) (g i) :=
  by
  have A : ∀ i, «expr‖ ‖» (g i) = g i := fun i => real.norm_of_nonneg (hg i)
  have B :
    ∀ n,
      «expr‖ ‖»
          (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n)
            (g i)) =
        finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n)
          (g i) :=
    fun n => by rwa [real.norm_eq_abs, abs_sum_of_nonneg']
  apply is_o_iff.2 fun ε εpos => _
  obtain ⟨N, hN⟩ : ∃ N : ℕ, ∀ b : ℕ, N ≤ b → «expr‖ ‖» (f b) ≤ ε / 2 * g b := by
    simpa only [A, eventually_at_top] using is_o_iff.mp h (half_pos εpos)
  have :
    «expr =o[ ] »
      (fun n : ℕ =>
        finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range N) (f i))
      at_top fun n : ℕ =>
      finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n) (g i) :=
    by
    apply is_o_const_left.2
    exact or.inr (h'g.congr fun n => (B n).symm)
  filter_upwards [is_o_iff.1 this (half_pos εpos), Ici_mem_at_top N] with n hn Nn
  calc
    «expr‖ ‖»
          (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n)
            (f i)) =
        «expr‖ ‖»
          (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range N)
              (f i) +
            finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (Ico N n)
              (f i)) :=
      by rw [sum_range_add_sum_Ico _ Nn]
    _ ≤
        «expr‖ ‖»
            (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range N)
              (f i)) +
          «expr‖ ‖»
            (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (Ico N n)
              (f i)) :=
      norm_add_le _ _
    _ ≤
        «expr‖ ‖»
            (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range N)
              (f i)) +
          finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (Ico N n)
            (ε / 2 * g i) :=
      add_le_add le_rfl (norm_sum_le_of_le _ fun i hi => hN _ (mem_Ico.1 hi).1)
    _ ≤
        «expr‖ ‖»
            (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range N)
              (f i)) +
          finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n)
            (ε / 2 * g i) :=
      by
      refine' add_le_add le_rfl _
      apply sum_le_sum_of_subset_of_nonneg
      · rw [range_eq_Ico]
        exact Ico_subset_Ico (zero_le _) le_rfl
      · intro i hi hident
        exact mul_nonneg (half_pos εpos).le (hg i)
    _ ≤
        ε / 2 *
            «expr‖ ‖»
              (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n)
                (g i)) +
          ε / 2 *
            finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n)
              (g i) :=
      by
      rw [← mul_sum]
      exact add_le_add hn (mul_le_mul_of_nonneg_left le_rfl (half_pos εpos).le)
    _ =
        ε *
          «expr‖ ‖»
            (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n)
              (g i)) :=
      by
      simp [B]
      ring

pow_div_pow_eventually_eq_at_top:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᶠ[ ] » -/
theorem pow_div_pow_eventually_eq_at_top {p q : ℕ} :
    «expr =ᶠ[ ] » (fun x : 𝕜 => x ^ p / x ^ q) at_top fun x => x ^ ((p : ℤ) - q) :=
  by
  apply (eventually_gt_at_top (0 : 𝕜)).mono fun x hx => _
  simp [zpow_sub₀ hx.ne']
#align pow_div_pow_eventually_eq_at_top pow_div_pow_eventually_eq_at_top
pow_div_pow_eventually_eq_at_bot:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᶠ[ ] » -/
theorem pow_div_pow_eventually_eq_at_bot {p q : ℕ} :
    «expr =ᶠ[ ] » (fun x : 𝕜 => x ^ p / x ^ q) at_bot fun x => x ^ ((p : ℤ) - q) :=
  by
  apply (eventually_lt_at_bot (0 : 𝕜)).mono fun x hx => _
  simp [zpow_sub₀ hx.ne]
#align pow_div_pow_eventually_eq_at_bot pow_div_pow_eventually_eq_at_bot

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
theorem asymptotics.is_o_sum_range_of_tendsto_zero {α : Type _} [normed_add_comm_group α] {f : ℕ → α}
    (h : tendsto f at_top ((nhds) 0)) :
    «expr =o[ ] »
      (fun n =>
        finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n) (f i))
      at_top fun n => (n : exprℝ) :=
  by
  have := ((is_o_one_iff (exprℝ)).2 h).sum_range fun i => zero_le_one
  simp only [sum_const, card_range, Nat.smul_one_eq_coe] at this
  exact this tendsto_coe_nat_at_top_at_top
#align asymptotics.is_o_sum_range_of_tendsto_zero asymptotics.is_o_sum_range_of_tendsto_zero
is_o_sub_self_inv:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds_within.ne -/

/-- If `f : 𝕜 → E` is bounded in a punctured neighborhood of `a`, then `f(x) = o((x - a)⁻¹)` as
`x → a`, `x ≠ a`. -/
theorem filter.is_bounded_under.is_o_sub_self_inv {𝕜 E : Type _} [normed_field 𝕜] [has_norm E] {a : 𝕜} {f : 𝕜 → E}
    (h : is_bounded_under (· ≤ ·) (nhds_within.ne a) (norm ∘ f)) :
    «expr =o[ ] » f (nhds_within.ne a) fun x => (x - a)⁻¹ :=
  by
  refine' (h.is_O_const (one_ne_zero' (exprℝ))).trans_is_o (is_o_const_left.2 <| or.inr _)
  simp only [(· ∘ ·), norm_inv]
  exact (tendsto_norm_sub_self_punctured_nhds a).inv_tendsto_zero
#align filter.is_bounded_under.is_o_sub_self_inv filter.is_bounded_under.is_o_sub_self_inv
is_o_pow_pow_at_top_of_lt:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =o[ ] » -/
theorem asymptotics.is_o_pow_pow_at_top_of_lt [order_topology 𝕜] {p q : ℕ} (hpq : p < q) :
    «expr =o[ ] » (fun x : 𝕜 => x ^ p) at_top fun x => x ^ q :=
  by
  refine' (is_o_iff_tendsto' _).mpr (tendsto_pow_div_pow_at_top_zero hpq)
  exact (eventually_gt_at_top 0).mono fun x hx hxq => (pow_ne_zero q hx.ne' hxq).elim
#align asymptotics.is_o_pow_pow_at_top_of_lt asymptotics.is_o_pow_pow_at_top_of_lt

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/-- The Cesaro average of a converging sequence converges to the same limit. -/
theorem filter.tendsto.cesaro_smul {E : Type _} [normed_add_comm_group E] [normed_space (exprℝ) E] {u : ℕ → E} {l : E}
    (h : tendsto u at_top ((nhds) l)) :
    tendsto
      (fun n : ℕ =>
        «expr • » (n⁻¹ : exprℝ)
          (finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n)
            (u i)))
      at_top ((nhds) l) :=
  by
  rw [← tendsto_sub_nhds_zero_iff, ← is_o_one_iff (exprℝ)]
  have := asymptotics.is_o_sum_range_of_tendsto_zero (tendsto_sub_nhds_zero_iff.2 h)
  apply ((is_O_refl (fun n : ℕ => (n : exprℝ)⁻¹) at_top).smul_is_o this).congr' _ _
  · filter_upwards [Ici_mem_at_top 1] with n npos
    have nposℝ : (0 : exprℝ) < n := nat.cast_pos.2 npos
    simp only [smul_sub, sum_sub_distrib, sum_const, card_range, sub_right_inj]
    rw [nsmul_eq_smul_cast (exprℝ), smul_smul, inv_mul_cancel nposℝ.ne', one_smul]
  · filter_upwards [Ici_mem_at_top 1] with n npos
    have nposℝ : (0 : exprℝ) < n := nat.cast_pos.2 npos
    rw [algebra.id.smul_eq_mul, inv_mul_cancel nposℝ.ne']
#align filter.tendsto.cesaro_smul filter.tendsto.cesaro_smul
cesaro:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/-- The Cesaro average of a converging sequence converges to the same limit. -/
theorem filter.tendsto.cesaro {u : ℕ → exprℝ} {l : exprℝ} (h : tendsto u at_top ((nhds) l)) :
    tendsto
      (fun n : ℕ =>
        (n⁻¹ : exprℝ) *
          finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range n)
            (u i))
      at_top ((nhds) l) :=
  h.cesaro_smul
